servinfo.title: Boost Pressure Control Solenoid Valve Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Boost Pressure Control Solenoid Valve Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Remove boost pressure control solenoid valve referring to Boost Pressure Control Solenoid Valve Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model .
Check the resistance between terminals of boost pressure control solenoid valve is within specification.
If resistance is not as specified, replace boost pressure control solenoid valve.

spec.title: Boost pressure control solenoid valve resistance

s1.ptxt: Using special tool, check operation of boost pressure solenoid valve as follows.

s2.ptxt: Check if vacuum is applied at nozzle “a” with nozzle “b” blocked off.
If vacuum is applied, replace solenoid valve.
Connect battery to solenoid valve as shown in figure.
In this state, check if vacuum is applied up to 40 kPa (0.4 kg/cm², 5.7 psi) in the same manner as step a).
If applied vacuum is lower than specified value, replace solenoid valve.

item.ptxt: It is necessary to pump lever of special tool several times quickly in order to increase vacuum up to specified value.
Valve does not hold vacuum but it does not indicate anything faulty.
